name: Delicious Rice Pudding
desc: A dessert made from rice. The soft, sticky rice and the sweet milk have melded together perfectly, their tastes complementing each other. If you eat it hot, you can enjoy the dense rice grains, and if you leave it till it's cold, you can savor the gentle fragrance of milk â€” each possessing its own beauty. People who eat such a dish cannot help but wonder: how many experiments led up to this moment?

customize.name: Recipe: Rice Pudding
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rice Pudding.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Rice Pudding
customize.desc: A dessert made from rice. After cooking the rice beforehand, it is placed into a pot together with the other ingredients, stirred evenly, and steamed. The mouthfeel is fragrant and soft, a perfect denouement to any meal.

customize.name: Suspicious Rice Pudding
customize.desc: A dessert made from rice. There must have been some miscalculation in the amount of ingredients to use, as this just tastes like a bowl of overly sweet rice. Well, time to grab some plain drink and scarf it down...
